TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class PageCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 提供保留对所有 控件（以及包含在 区域中的其他服务器控件）的引用的目录（用户已在单个 Web 部件页关闭了这些控件），这使得用户能够将已关闭的控件添加回页面。

span.span: Provides a catalog that keeps references to all controls (and other server controls contained in zones) that a user has closed on a single Web Parts page, which enables users to add the closed controls back to the page.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在 Web 部件页面上提供了一个非常具体的用途：它充当页面目录，以维护以前添加到用户关闭的页面的任何控件，以便用户可以将它们添加回页面。The class serves one very specific purpose on a Web Parts page: it acts as a page catalog to maintain any controls previously added to the page that a user has closed, so that the user can add them back to the page. 仅当网页处于目录显示模式时，此控件才可见，这是一个允许用户在页面上添加和移除控件的特殊视图。This control is visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode, a special view that enables users to add and remove controls on the page. 如果希望为用户提供关闭和重新打开控件的灵活性，请向页面添加控件。Add a control to your page if you want to provide users with the flexibility of closing and reopening controls. 如果页面不允许用户关闭控件，则无需向 页面添加控件。If your page does not allow users to close controls at all, there is no need to add a control to your page. 仅将已关闭的控件添加到页目录中。Only closed controls are added to the page catalog. 关闭的控件具有几个属性：A closed control has several attributes: - 它在页面上不可见。It is not visible on the page. - 它不会在页上呈现。It is not rendered on the page. - 它不参与页生命周期阶段。It does not participate in page life-cycle phases. 关闭控件不同于删除控件，而是将其从页中永久删除。Closing a control is different from deleting it, which permanently removes it from the page. 用户可以从页目录重新打开已关闭的控件实例，但在用户删除控件之后，就不能再恢复该特定实例了。A user can reopen a closed control instance from a page catalog, but after a user deletes a control, he or she can never recover that specific instance. 向页面添加控件的最常见且最方便的方法 是将其声明为页持久性格式。The most common and convenient way to add a control to a page is by declaring it in page persistence format. 与任何声明性 控件一样， 必须在网页上 ASP.NET 标记元素的正确上下文中声明控件。As with any declarative control, a control must be declared within the proper context of ASP.NET markup elements on a Web page. 有关如何在网页中声明控件的工作代码示例 ，请参阅本主题的 "示例" 部分。For a working code example of how to declare a control in a Web page, see the Example section of this topic. 必须将以下声明性元素序列添加到页面：You must add the following sequence of declarative elements to the page: 1. ``必须声明一个元素，并且 `` 必须向其添加一个子元素，以包含 在该区域中声明的任何控件。An `` element must be declared, and a child `` element must be added to it to contain any controls declared in the zone. 2. ``元素必须添加为元素的子元素 `` 。An `` element must be added as a child of the `` element. 还可能有其他 控件声明为元素的子元素 `` ，包括 或 控件。There might also be other controls declared as child elements of the `` element, including or controls. 类只有一个可用属性（属性），该属性 重写基属性，以便在未提供值的情况下可以为页目录提供默认标题。The class has only one usable property, the property, which overrides the base property so that a default title can be provided for the page catalog if no value is supplied. 类的其余属性 会重写继承的属性，但实际上并不用于呈现控件。The remaining properties for the class override the inherited properties, but are not actually used for rendering the control. 它们只会被重写，以便可以对它们进行特殊代码属性的设置，以将它们从等设计工具中隐藏起来 [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] 。They are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 不应使用这些隐藏属性，因为它们对呈现没有影响。You should not use these hidden properties, because they have no effect on rendering. 这一事实是，它们在 IntelliSense 中是隐藏的，Visual Studio 中的 "属性" 窗格可帮助开发人员避免错误地使用它们。The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake. 所有这些隐藏属性在各自的帮助主题中都有相应的记录。All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics. 类还具有几个重要的方法。The class also has several important methods. 方法 为页目录中的每个控件检索一个对象 ，这使 控件能够显示每个服务器控件的信息，而无需创建该控件的实例。The method retrieves a object for each control in the page catalog, which enables a control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of that control. 另一种方法是 方法。Another method is the method. 此方法 根据传递给方法的说明获取特定控件的实例。This method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在网页上以声明方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively on a Web page. 此示例包含四个部分：This example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含 控件、 控件和控件的网页 。A Web page that contains a control, a control, and a control. - 一个源代码文件，其中包含两个自定义 控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面顶部有两个 `register` 指令，一个用于用户控件，一个用于包含两个自定义控件的已编译组件 。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 请注意，此页具有对控件的声明性引用 ，该控件嵌套在声明性元素的适当层次结构中，如本主题的 "备注" 部分所述。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements as described in the Remarks section of this topic. 还有一个 `` 元素，该元素包含对标准 ASP.NET 控件和两个自定义控件的引用 ，这些控件都是用户可以从目录中选择的控件。There is also an `` element, which contains references for a standard ASP.NET control and the two custom controls, all of which are the controls that users can select from the catalog. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/PageCatalogPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/PageCatalogPartVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是这两个控件的源代码 。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 添加一个控件，然后使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件将该页返回到 "浏览" 模式。Add one of the controls, then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 单击谓词菜单 (其中一个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **关闭** " 以关闭控件。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Close** to close the control. 将页返回到目录模式，注意关闭的控件将显示在页目录中，并可重新添加回页面。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that the control you closed now appears in the page catalog, and is available to be added back to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认构造函数; 类中没有声明任何构造函数 ，因此在创建类的新实例时，不会执行任何特殊任务。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 在内部使用构造函数来创建类的实例。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 但这种情况不太可能，你需要 在自己的代码中以编程方式使用构造函数。It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控件的预期用途是使页面开发人员能够在设计时以声明方式将其添加到页面中。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为控件的成员的属性未在用于 呈现控件的 Web 部件控件集内的任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;设置它不会对呈现产生任何影响。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，请将代码特性设置为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 在 Visual Studio 中使用控件时， 属性在 "属性" 窗格或 IntelliSense 中不可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果要使用此属性，则需要创建从类继承的自定义类 。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承的 属性，也可以重写该属性并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 返回目录中可用 控件的说明的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: ，包含页目录中每个已关闭 控件的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each closed control in a page catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为类中声明的抽象基方法提供实现 。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法返回目录中每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 对象包含有关控件的基本信息 ，包括其 ID、对控件的对象引用，以及从类继承的几个重要属性的值 ，例如 和 。A object contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可提高性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录时，它需要一些有关它所包含的每个控件的信息，包括标题、描述、图标 (（如果存在）) 和 ID。When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 无需创建每个控件的实例即可获取此信息， 创建目录的区域 将为每个将在目录中的控件调用方法，并且调用仅返回控件的说明信息。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例包含四个部分：This example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个源代码文件，其中包含两个自定义 控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含 控件和 引用多个服务器控件的控件的网页。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用方法的事件处理代码 。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义控件的源代码 。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三部分是包含控件的网页 。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意， `Button1_Click` 方法会调用 方法，获取 页面目录中控件的说明，并将详细信息写入标签。Notice that the `Button1_Click` method calls the method, obtains the descriptions of the controls in the page catalog, and writes the details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/PageCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/PageCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 将一个或多个控件添加到该页，然后使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件将该页返回到浏览模式。Add one or more controls to the page, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 单击谓词菜单 (一个或多个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **关闭**"。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one or more of the controls, and click **Close**. 将页返回到目录模式，并注意您关闭的控件现在显示在页目录中，并可被添加回该页。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that the control or controls you closed now appear in the page catalog, and are available to be added back to the page. 单击 " **显示 WebPart 说明** " 按钮，将有关页目录中控件的详细信息写入标签。Click the **Display WebPart descriptions** button to write the details about the controls in the page catalog to the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回对控件的引用， 其说明详细信息与传入方法的对象的值匹配 。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 通常，此方法与方法一起使用 ，后者用于检索目录中的所有控件的说明。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog. 然后，可以通过将单个对象传递到方法，按需检索或操作各个控件 。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例包含四个部分：This example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个源代码文件，其中包含两个自定义 控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含 控件和 引用多个服务器控件的控件的网页。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用方法的事件处理代码 。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 此代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义控件的源代码 。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三部分是包含控件的网页 。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意，该 `Button2_Click` 方法获取 目录中的控件说明，调用 方法以检索集合的页目录中的所有控件，然后将这些控件添加回页面。Notice that the `Button2_Click` method obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, calls the method to retrieve all the controls in the page catalog for a collection, and then adds those controls back to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/PageCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/PageCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，请在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录模式**" 以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，可以看到可添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 将一个或多个控件添加到该页，然后使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件将该页返回到浏览模式。Add one or more controls to the page, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 单击谓词菜单 (一个或多个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **关闭**"。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one or more of the controls, and click **Close**. 将页返回到目录模式，注意现在控件或您关闭的控件将显示在页目录中，并可供添加回页中。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that now the control or controls you closed appear in the page catalog, and are available to be added back to the page. 单击 " **添加 WebPart 控件** " 按钮，将页面目录中的控件添加回页面。Click the **Add WebPart Controls** button to add the controls in the page catalog back to the page. 使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件可将页面恢复到正常浏览模式;添加的控件在页上可见。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to normal browse mode; the controls you added are visible on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为控件的成员的属性未在用于 呈现控件的 Web 部件控件集内的任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;设置它不会对呈现产生任何影响。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，请将代码特性设置为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 在 Visual Studio 中使用控件时， 属性在 "属性" 窗格或 IntelliSense 中不可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果要使用此属性，则需要创建从类继承的自定义类 。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承的 属性，也可以重写该属性并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为控件的成员的属性未在用于 呈现控件的 Web 部件控件集内的任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;设置它不会对呈现产生任何影响。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，请将代码特性设置为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 在 Visual Studio 中使用控件时， 属性在 "属性" 窗格或 IntelliSense 中不可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果要使用此属性，则需要创建从类继承的自定义类 。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义类可以使用继承的 属性，也可以重写该属性并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在目录模式中可见时，属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 在页面中声明控件时，可以使用属性设置属性的值 `Title` 。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，则使用特定于区域性的默认值描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 以下源代码显示了如何 在声明性标记中设置控件的属性。The following source code shows how to set the property on the control in declarative markup. 如果未设置属性，或指定了空字符串 ( "" ) ，则将提供默认标题。If you do not set the property, or if you assign an empty string (""), a default title is supplied.
